long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gravity Ads creates a new level of convenience with a user-friendly interface designed specifically for Telegram Ads users.

You'll be able to modernize the official promote.telegram.org interface in one click, manage your ads massively and efficiently, and enjoy the simplified processes we offer. 

We've thought about every aspect of our user interface to make your Telegram Ads advertising experience as simple and enjoyable as possible.

Key Functions:
Table Management.
 Support for customizing column size, grouping by fields, hiding columns and quick editing. Added universal search for all columns and ability to adjust the number of ads in the table.

Mass company management.
 Suspend, startup, budget/CPM adjustment and mass deletion of companies. 

Advanced statistics.
CPS display for selected periods and in-depth analysis of ad campaigns effectiveness.

Mass channel addition.
Additional field for mass channel insertion simplifies the process of adding new advertising channels.

After registering on the website, your account will be manually verified by our managers. This may take some time, but it guarantees the security and efficiency of our platform

 If you have any questions or access problems, please contact us at help@gravity-ads.pro We are always ready to help!

Join us and find out how convenient and effective advertising on Telegram with Gravity Ads can be!

*To use the plugin you need to have an active account in promote.telegram.org
The plugin does not have access to the promotional cabinet, user accounts and passwords. It only modernizes the interface of promoting.telegram.org advertising cabinet display in Google Chrome browser.
We do not collect cookies or other personal data

Design by Magnetto.pro
